Status page goes live

5th September 2011

The status page status.prosepoint.net goes live. We also retrospectively fill in the uptime history of ProsePoint Express.

As of 5th September 2011, ProsePoint Express has been up continously for 175 days (since 14th March 2011).

About this site

This site contains service status and uptime information for ProsePoint Express. If ProsePoint Express is down, it will be logged here.

  • 25 Nov 2010 » ProsePoint Express goes live
